Name: Dulchin
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This dry, amber coloured, fruity cocktail carries a pisco punch.
History: Drinks historian Dave Wondrich says that this cocktail was created for and named after the wealthy heir of a New York hardware company "who couldn't drink grain spirits and was bored with rum", hence the bartender used pisco, a grape spirit as the base.
Nutrition: One serving of Dulchin contains 189 calories
